data.text: @Juliest101 Wishing you the fullest recovery Julie.
@Juliest101 Well there is COVID and there is covid. Glad you manage to dodge the real bullet and till the rubber one came along. Seen soo many suffer with the real one.
@Juliest101 Same here… two bastard years and now this!!! https://t.co/O1l2XSZsAH

@OliveEaton16 @Juliest101 He's fine thanks. Working hard at the University, learning Polish, keeping abreast of the news here and in Europe. A comment he did make is every local person he knows seems to know a Ukrainian and is worried for them. No surprise that as a nation, Poland has been so welcoming.
@harrison_alan @Juliest101 Alan, how is your son - in Warsaw? have I got that right?

@Juliest101 Many people in the restaurant? Server no mask? I regularly visited restaurants pre pandemic, haven't even had a coffee indoors for 2 years. If there were still some semblance of rules to give expectation of behaviours, I may risk it but not yet. Covid... No thank you.
